ygData.subject: Re: stop whining about wizards (read on)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ehehe wizards are very god at dueling at later levels even more but to advance you must kill other things and to do this or to go in dungeon where are many
ygData.messageBody:
At 18.53 25/05/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
> i just spent the day dueling people so far i can beat a rogue EASILY, a necro
> was a joke, and another wizard tied with me. i have yet to try a pure warrior
> class but i can't wait. i also want to try a cleric. i am level 15 and i was
> killing the rogue when he was 14 and the rest when they conned even


Ehehe wizards are very god at dueling at later levels even more but to advance
you must kill other things and to do this or to go in dungeon where are many
monstars attacking you start to alue less and less you start to be only root
machine and eventual nuker as your nukes leave you OOM so soon. the problem is
not in one kill this is easy for wizard to do, but try to win against 20 blue
monsters who will do it faster? a group with monk and wizard or group with monk
and enchanter AND PET or group with a Monk and a cleric or druid or any other
spell caster go beter in then a wizard. If you change target to red monsters
all other can give a hand our spells are resisted.

Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro
